title: VIP 3 - Dividends for holders of wsVAL generated from Vikings Finance protocol.
body:
As our platform grows Vikings Finance and the treasury backing it is working to generate cashflow and yield. While this can be compounded back into the treasury we would like to explore the possibility of giving a portion of this back to holders of wsVAL through dividends.

BACKGROUND

Vikings Finance is a reserve backed currency, this reserve gives the overall platform an inherent value. As we have launched we have looked to innovate in ways to get the best return on treasury assets. This includes the pending launch of the Vikings AMM, a decentralised exchange where trading fees can be captured by the treasury. Additionally we will look to propose additional ways to utilise treasury funds in interest generating strategies in the near future.

PROPOSAL

Revenue generated by Vikings Finance in the form of yield from treasury assets, fees from our AMM and any other potential future sources, could be sent back into the treasury to compound returns.

However we have been looking at other options to give back to the Vikings Finance community and holders of wsVAL in the shorter term. We would like to propose that a portion of this revenue generated by paid out in a dividend, in the form of Magic Internet Money ($MIM) to those who hold wsVAL.

As revenue is generated, a % of this is proposed to be sent to a contract, where holders of wsVAL could claim their fair share in $MIM. Increasing the incentive to hold and stake VAL.

Treasury growth is important for any reserve backed currency and a significant % of revenue would still flow back to the treasury to further grow compounding effects. Please note revenue is just that, and not treasury funds from bonding, these would move to the treasury as usual.

This proposal the is for the amount % of revenue generated by Vikings Finance to be distributed to wsVAL holders in the form of $MIM:
author: 0x2981bb8f2883a462C5c413DE604C3B3e36884800
